project.description:
> Deploy war file to tomcat instance. based on the BUILD_TYPE
> Please note deployment can be done to DEV, UAT or PROD environment.
> BUILD_TYPE parameter must be "dev", "uat" or "prod"
> Deployment wars are picked up from the latest invoicebinder build.

[Process]
1. deploy ROOT war. (webinvoicesignup)
2. deploy webinvoice war.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#1. add host key for jenkins in the build machine mkdir -p ~/.ssh ssh-keyscan -H $TOMCAT_SERVER >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
#2. cleanup old ROOT application. sshpass -p "$ROOT_PASSWD" ssh $ADMIN_USER@$TOMCAT_SERVER "echo $ROOT_PASSWD | sudo -S rm -f -R $APP_FOLDER" sshpass -p "$ROOT_PASSWD" ssh $ADMIN_USER@$TOMCAT_SERVER "echo $ROOT_PASSWD | sudo -S rm -f -R $APP_FOLDER.war"

#1. add host key for jenkins in the build machine mkdir -p ~/.ssh ssh-keyscan -H $TOMCAT_SERVER >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
#2. deploy ROOT application curl -T - -u tomcat:tomcat "http://$TOMCAT_SERVER:8080/manager/text/deploy?update=true&path=/" < $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/ROOT.war
#3. deploy DEMO application curl -T - -u tomcat:tomcat "http://$TOMCAT_SERVER:8080/manager/text/deploy?update=true&path=/demo" < $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/webinvoice.war
#grant permissions to root application. sshpass -p "$ROOT_PASSWD" ssh $ADMIN_USER@$TOMCAT_SERVER "echo $ROOT_PASSWD | sudo -S chmod 777 $APP_FOLDER"

#1. Deploy and extract root application. sshpass -p "$ROOT_PASSWD" scp $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/webinvoice.war $ADMIN_USER@$TOMCAT_SERVER:$APP_FOLDER sshpass -p "$ROOT_PASSWD" ssh $ADMIN_USER@$TOMCAT_SERVER unzip $APP_FOLDER/webinvoice.war -d $APP_FOLDER/webinvoice

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: Deployment Results (InvoiceBinder) SUCCESS - Build = ${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MAJOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MINOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_NUMBER"}, Build Type = $BUILD_TYPE
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
InvoiceBinder build ${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MAJOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MINOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_NUMBER"} has been deployed successfully.
This deployment is for configuration $BUILD_TYPE
Regards, Builder (Jenkins)
